Yoroi is a light-client wallet for Cardano, built by Emurgo. And it's now available for Firefox user! Be sure to update to Firefox 67 to be able to install:   https://t.co/pNiu58t7WX  You can create your Yoroi wallet with Firefox, Chrome, Brave, Android and iOS! @YoroiWallet
